original_text: Then the angel said to me, ‘The words on the paper tell about bad events for the whole earth. This will be in future years. On one side of the paper, it says that a man must not rob anyone. If he does, people will send him away from his own country. On the other side of the paper, it says that a man must not speak false words. If he does, people will send him away from his own country.
korean_text: 그가 내게 이르되 이는 온 땅 위에 내리는 저주라 도둑질하는 자는 그 이쪽 글대로 끊어지고 맹세하는 자는 그 저쪽 글대로 끊어지리라 하니

sentences.original_text: Then the angel said to me
tell about bad events for the whole earth
sentences.korean_translation: 온 세상에 일어날 나쁜 일들에 대해 말한다

sentences.original_text: This will be in future years
On one side of the paper
it says that a man must not rob anyone
sentences.korean_translation: 사람이 누구도 훔치지 말아야 한다고 쓰여 있다

sentences.original_text: people will send him away from his own country
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그를 자기 나라에서 쫓아낼 것이다

sentences.original_text: On the other side of the paper
it says that a man must not speak false words
sentences.korean_translation: 사람이 거짓 말을 하지 말아야 한다고 쓰여 있다

sentences.original_text: people will send him away from his own country
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그를 자기 나라에서 쫓아낼 것이다
